alert.note: Alert for Eastern Elko County; Northern Nye County - Mojave (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 02 at 10:16AM PDT until July 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 426 AND 470... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 426 Northern Nye County- Mojave and Fire Weather Zone 470 Eastern Elko County. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Elko County; Northern Nye County - Mojave
